items.name: Issam
items.text: I'm currently learning Spanish with Milli, and it's been a fantastic experience. Her teaching style is engaging, patient and adapted to individual needs. She makes learning fun and easy to understand. I highly recommend her!

items.name: Johan
items.text: Mili is a 10/10 Spanish teacher. Super sweet and makes learning fun. Always smiling and helping me learn, even when I forget to do homework!

items.name: Kamila
items.text: Mili conducts lessons professionally. She's always prepared and conveys her knowledge in an interesting, cheerful and simple way. Children love classes with Mili. We all see progress in their learning. We highly recommend learning Spanish with Mili :)

items.name: Lance
items.text: After a few years of taking Spanish classes, I finally decided to get a private tutor. Mili's classes are interesting and her teaching style has been very helpful. In just a few weeks of meeting with her, I've learned more in a one-on-one environment than in a classroom.

items.name: Matt
items.text: I've been learning with Mili for the past 4 months and she's great. She adapts to what you need to improve lesson by lesson, plus she brings a lot of enthusiasm and energy that helps a lot!

items.name: Paul
items.text: Mili is a diamond in the huge haystack of Preply tutors. She clearly has a passion for teaching languages and enjoys it. She's very perceptive about your needs as a language learner and will help you progress faster than you think you're capable of. Ultimately, her very personal and student-centered teaching style makes learning fun. You'll always look forward to her classes!

items.name: André
items.text: I love learning with Mili. She's such a fun and nice person, and a professional teacher. She knows how to practice the language.

items.name: Ivana
items.text: Mili is a teacher with a lot of experience and patience. The lessons are very varied and she adapts very well to the student's needs. I have a lot of fun in classes and thanks to Mili I'm improving my Spanish knowledge in both informal and formal settings. I highly recommend classes with her!

items.name: Emna
items.text: Mili is the best Spanish tutor! She's incredibly patient, always takes time to explain everything clearly and makes learning very enjoyable. Her lessons are super organized, engaging and tailored to my needs. I've improved so much thanks to her guidance and support. I highly recommend her to anyone looking for a kind, dedicated and professional tutor!

items.name: Victoria
items.text: Very kind, patient and engaging for my 5-year-old daughter. The lessons make learning fun, and my daughter is excited to talk to Mili every week.

items.name: Mario
items.text: Mili's lessons are individual and very well structured. I really enjoy the mix of conversation, grammar, reading, new vocabulary and cultural information. Great teacher, always smiling, highly recommended!

items.name: Yoshiro
items.text: Although she's quite young, she has a talent for teaching: she has the gift to teach.

items.name: Chadi
items.text: Mili is the best tutor you can have; kind, passionate and understanding; if you want to learn Spanish, she supports her students and creates a positive learning environment. She's the best.

items.name: Ellie
items.text: Milli is a great tutor; she prepares presentations and additional exercises you can do on your own so you can study more than the hour you pay for. She's super enthusiastic and kind; I highly recommend her.

items.name: Gurshant
items.text: Mili is very kind and always encourages me during lessons. She's very flexible with her style, and I recommend her for anyone who wants to start learning Spanish!

items.name: Celestino
items.text: Mili is a fantastic and very professional teacher, always punctual and has different methods to make me learn Spanish, she's very fun :)

items.name: Dennis
items.text: It's always very fun with Mili. She really helps a lot with learning Spanish. Super kind and friendly!

items.name: Calvin
items.text: Really good teacher, I'm having so much fun learning Spanish!

items.name: Pascal
items.text: I always look forward to lessons with Mili. I'm a complete beginner in Spanish, but she makes it really easy to digest. She's super empathetic, well prepared and her English is amazing, so it's really helpful for anyone starting with Spanish but knowing English.

items.name: Linda
items.text: Mili is an incredibly cool teacher, with charm and playfulness she teaches me Spanish with so much fun. She responds to my needs and desires and is very flexible. I look forward to more lessons with her!

items.name: Abdulla
items.text: Milli has passion for making people speak Spanish, makes the language easier and is very kind and well-mannered.
